website_summaries.verdict: A great primer for improving skin's texture and minimizing pores.
pros: Makes skin smoother and fills in pores and fine lines
Helps give skin a matte, shine-free finish
Has a silky soft texture and is easy to apply
A little product goes a long way
cons: Doesn't necessarily control oil all day

customer_reviews.title: Not the original product.
customer_reviews.text: Ugh wish I had read all the reviews before buying. I’ve used the original product before so didn’t think I NEEDED to read reviews. but what I received was like the other reviews said: a thick tinted concealer, not the original transparent pore minimizer. Sucks!
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy from this seller!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give it one star. I love this product, but do NOT buy from this seller!! I opened my tube and the safety seal was not properly on. When I went to use the product, it was clearly a CC or BB cream, not the product advertised. I’m reporting this company to Amazon to have them removed from the marketplace.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Janssen

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: I love the product. This was not authentic. It had a gray rubber stopper in the opening of the tube that had clealy been placed there by a third party. The contents of the tube was a tinted moisturizer that was nothing like a primer. This got tossed straight into the trash. I have no idea what product was actually in the tube. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Christy W

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Best pore concealer ever. Leaves flawless face to apply liquid, cream or airbrush make up on. Love it! Make sure to apply it 1st, then moisturizer, then foundation!
customer_reviews.author: Pro Makeup Artist4Life

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, a pore minimizer that doesn't break me out
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, a pore minimizer that doesn't break me out, is my skin color and blends flawlessly. A+ It's expensive but seriously worth it, don't spend your money anywhere else. I'm SUPER acne prone and this hasn't caused any problems and I've been using it for 6+ months.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It’s like putting silk on your face! It covers the pores extremely well and my makeup lasts so much longer when I use it. Totally satisfied with the actual product, but the tube is a lot smaller than I expected, yet a little goes a long way
customer_reviews.author: Splotchy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best primer I've ever used . Like spackle for Pores 😊
customer_reviews.author: Wendie L. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my all time favorite products! I use it everyday after I apply face lotion and before I apply foundation. It makes my foundation go in super smooth! I mainly use it in my forehead, nose, and cheeks ( really anywhere that I have noticeable pores). I can definitely tell a difference in days that I forget to use it. This is a simple game changer for an easy makeup routine!
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Sowell

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Not as advertised. Contents are much more liquify and made me break out terribly. Bought another one from Ulta and compared consistency. Definitely not the same product.
customer_reviews.author: Angela E

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff. Only gave it 4 stars because I ...
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff. Only gave it 4 stars because I feel like once I wear it for a while it clogs my pores up. I don't break out, but I just feel like they start looking bigger and bigger after I remove it. Otherwise, it is a great face smoother!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hill

customer_reviews.title: FAKE! NOT Benefit Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not 100% sure what is in this tube, but it is most certainly NOT the product advertised. It was runny, iridescent (which this product never is), and not the cooling balm. The packaging was blurry as well so I'm guessing I got ripped off! Returning!!
customer_reviews.author: world war two

customer_reviews.title: For oily skin type, it works.
customer_reviews.text: This is really working on me. It last longer . My face is oily type , so after I applied this on me. The sweat can't remove my makeup from my face. I can tell the obvious difference. My makeup last longer. If you apply this and go out, your face looks like a natural look without oil. I love this and will definiltey buy again. Compare to the other product, it is a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Wint P.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality. Dont buy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this several years ago (when it was just the real tube and before they put a drawing if a woman on it). I loved it SOOOO much I hoarded it. It was perfect. --- unfortunately in the years since I last had ti buy it, benefit has apparently replaced with a cheap formula that doesnt make my pores disappear and you can see the color of it sitting on skin (the old used to blend completely and did so well with pores I didnt have to wear anything else on my skin) Too bad. Highly disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: S Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: This product is the absolute best when it comes to providing light coverage and diminishing ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is the absolute best when it comes to providing light coverage and diminishing the look of pores. I will never be without it! It feels very silky when applied and just love how it matches whatever skin tone you have. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: be-a-proverbs31-woman

customer_reviews.title: UHH
customer_reviews.text: Okay well if you want to know if it's the real product that benefit sells NO the top is so different than the real thing it made my pores flawless but i got so much acne i would not buy it just buy the real thing I've never broke out when i uses the real primer.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: My go to face primer
customer_reviews.text: Yes expensive but it's a great primer. Can use by itself with no foundation for a quick on the go look or take the time to put a foundation on after for a great base. Stops the shine and give some light weight coverage if used alone
customer_reviews.author: G. Rummell

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright
customer_reviews.text: I like how it feels, very silky. Doesn’t do exactly what it says which is to reduce pores it just smooths out your skin a bit but you can’t tel once you apply any makeup over it. I love the smell and silkiness but I don’t see a big difference when I apply as a base or when I do not. Too expensive to not see improvement.
customer_reviews.author: monkeywrench87

customer_reviews.title: Magic Cream
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to for sure! From being in the hot sun and natural aging the pores on my nose are obvious. This is a very light cream that only requires a very small amount and feels like silk when it goes on. I call it my magic cream because my pores disappear even without liquid makeup over!! Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Fern A. Panzer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for over a year. I"m over 70 and this product helps give my skin a smoother look. It works well with the cream foundations that I use and make my skin feel like velvet. I usually apply it before putting on my foundation. If I'm staying home, I sometimes use this product without foundation, because it does have a bit of a tint. I've tried other pore minimizers, but this one is the best of what I've found that I can afford
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Allergic Reaction
customer_reviews.text: I applied this product for the first time today and it really did help. However, in less than one hour my face was beet red, skin was very warm and slightly swollen. The blotchiness carried through to my arms and oddly, knees but not midsection. It was very scary, even called EMTs but everything checked out and now two hours after application (and subsequent removal) my skin is just about back to normal. I'm sure it's a great product, I've never had anything like this happen with any makeup or primer before, but wanted to post for those with sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Niermeyer

customer_reviews.title: Received different product than what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I loved this the last time I ordered it. However, this time I received a different product. Not what I ordered.i ordered pore minimized and received a primer.
customer_reviews.author: Moussa  Hashem

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and great product
customer_reviews.text: This pore primer is very useful and actually does a good job in stufling the pores on face. It is very obvious to see how it works after you apply it like your pore is smaller and the skin is smoother. It is also mosisture and won’t feel dry after using it.
customer_reviews.author: my36

customer_reviews.title: Received a tiny tub
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression I was getting the large tub. After all the description says product is 1.6 oz. what I received is a .75 tub. Hence the low review.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: FAKE!
customer_reviews.text: This is not the Benefit Cosmetics primer. I bought a tube from Sephora and then wanted a second tube. This is a deceptive knock off. The packaging is “slightly” different. The product terrible! It feels, smells and acts totally different. It is a cheap stinky foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Nave

customer_reviews.title: Silky smooth
customer_reviews.text: I really like the the appearance of my skin after use. As i have gotten older (60+), the pores in my facial area have become more enlarge. I was looking for a cream that may help smooth this problem. This cream was just what I needed. The cream smooth my problem areas and complimented the small amount of makeup i use as well. Very happy with results. Also, I have to mention, the fragrance is very nice.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I actually tried this before and loved it. I live on a small island and unfortunately it is not available here. I was real happy to find it on Amazon, I just wish you had the larger size tube.

customer_reviews.title: Great cover up
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is GREAT. I don’t wear foundation on my face, but use it on my nose. Does the job!

customer_reviews.title: I totally love this product
customer_reviews.text: I totally love this product, it work! This is my third one I buy and the first one I buy on Amazon. It’s very silky and applies evenly, just have to wait a couple of minutes before applying foundation to avoid cakey face.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this primer. I have used many primers before this, and this one is the best primer I have ever tried. It is so smooth when you apply it and doesn’t clog your pores. I gave two stars for value for money because it is expensive for the size of it.

customer_reviews.title: A little dab will do you
customer_reviews.text: A little dab will do you is best describes how much of this product you need to cover large pores/blackheads. It goes on with a fingertip and spreads so easily, with excellent coverage, doing exactly what it says it will do. It does this without giving your nose or face heavy make up or pasty look. If you desire to use makeup over the top of it, this product helps with it's coverage as well.

customer_reviews.title: Giving it a four because of the price - I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: Giving it a four because of the price - I'm not sure if order again because $42 for this little tube is ridiculous.

It feels great and it doesn't feel of perfume. My only gripe is that it's pretty expensive in my opinion. Probably not when compared to other products out there though. Will buy it again.

product_meta.title: Benefit Cosmetics POREfessional Pro Balm Face Primer Pore Minimizer .75 Ounce
product_meta.description: The POREfessional Pro Balm works to reduce the appearance of pores and fine lines for smoother-than-smooth looking skin. Apply this silky, lightweight balm alone, or under or over makeup. Translucent, no-oil formula complements all skintones and helps makeup stay put. Contains a Vitamin E derivative known to protect skin. How to apply: To use under makeup: Apply to clean, lightly moisturized skin. Pat on problem areas and blend with fingertips. To use over makeup: Pat on lightly over makeup and blend. PRIME IN THE A.M. -- apply a thin layer to clean, lightly moisturized skin. Pat lightly from the center of the face outward with fingertips. Wait seconds, then apply makeup as usual. APPLY WHENEVER PORES COME OUT OF HIDING: If pores reappear, pat delicately on T-zone over makeup and blend. The lightweight, no-oil formula means a beautifully refined complexion. Beauty Tip: Apply a thin layer of the POREfessional PRO balm to clean, moisturized skin.
feature_bullets: Quickly minimize the appearance of pores and fine lines for smoother-than-smooth skin.
Apply this silky, lightweight balm alone, under or over makeup.
The translucent formula contains a vitamin E derivative known to protect skin.
